name: Agent
lore: Short snippets of factual or historical information about the character that can be composed together in a random order.
knowledge: A unique identifier for the knowledge item.

messageExamples.user: The user name or placeholder (e.g., {{user1}}, {{user2}}, etc.) for the user in the conversation.

content.text: The text content of the message.

postExamples: Examples of tweets or posts that the character would create, capturing their style, tone, and interests.
topics: Topics the character is interested in.

all: General style directions for how the character should speak or write.
chat: Style directions specifically for chat contexts, like Discord.
post: Style directions specifically for post contexts, like Twitter.

adjectives: Adjectives describing the character that can be used in prompts.
